summary: a small mod that changes four NIF files so you do not only have bloodeffects when you hit some-one but also metalimpact effects
descriptionHtml:
[size=38][color=Red][u]METAL COMBAT[/u][/color][/size]

[color=green]=====>Small Descripiton<===================================================================[/color]

a small mod that changes four NIF files so you do not only have bloodeffects when you hit some-one but also metalimpact effects

[color=green]=====>More info<=========================================================================[/color]

What i did: i made a nif file that combind the bloodeffects and the metalimpacteffects
if you realy want to see what happen please look at the pictures and the video

[color=green]=====>Metal Impact Frequentie<===========================================================[/color]

Mod you might wanna try becuze it fits with this one ;)
[Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10445] MetalImpact Frequentie [/URL]

Thx, Plz Comment and Don\'t forget to endorse if you loved it ;)
author: Lordaloa
